item.content:encoded:
Disney+ Hotstar Premium Mod APK direct download link

In this article, you will be able to direct download Hotstar mod Apk for Android. You can Watch All Hotstar Original Shows, Disney+ Shows, Movies, Live Sports etc for free. Hotstar MOD APK (Premium Unlocked) is one of the most popular streaming player apps in the world. We provide Hotstar APKs file for Android 4.0+ and up.

You can Watch All your Favorite Tv Shows, Movies, Episodes & Live Cricket Matches from Hotstar mod app/apk for free

Also read : How to Fix VLC Chromecast Subtitles Not Showing Problem

What is Hotstar Mod Apk ?

Hotstar is a Live Streaming App that lets you watch TV shows, Latest Movies, Sports & Live News on the go. With Hotstar App, You can Watch the Latest American Shows & Hollywood Blockbuster Movies Uncut and Ad-Free. It is easy to download and install to your mobile phone.

Hotstar Premium APK Features:

  • Watch Live Sports : Live Sports Like Live Cricket (IPL/T20/world cup), Football, Live Tennis Grand Slams with Hotstar Mod Apk.

  • Watch Hollywood & Bollywood Movies : Watch Latest Hollywood & Bollywood Movies.

 

  • Stream News Channels : Stream Popular News Channels like Aaj Tak, Republic TV news channel, Polimer News, ABP News Live & Asianet News Live with Hotstar mod apk.
  • Watch English TV Shows : Watch tv series like Game of Thrones (GOT), The Big Bang Theory, Chernobyl, etc.
  • Watch Hotstar Original Shows : Watch Hotstar Specials (Hotstar Originals) Like Special Ops, Hostages, Criminal Justice, etc by Using Hotstar Premium Mod Apk for Completely Free
  • Stream Live TV Channels : Star Plus, Star Sports, Star World, Star Bharat, HBO, Nat Geo, Fox Life, Star Utsav, Star Maa, Star Jalsha, Asianet
  • Kids Content : Hotstar Vip Mod App offers you all the Disney+ Shows & Videos for the Kids to get entertained
  • Disney+ Movies & Shows : Hotstar premium mod apk includes access to Disney Plus original content, along with 100s of other Series & Movies.

Hotstar Mod Apk freatures

  • No Login or Sign Up Required
  • Disney+ Unlocked
  • Removed Ads
  • Premium Features Unlocked
  • Sports Pack Unlocked
  • Screenshot Allowed

Direct Download Hotstar MOD Apk VIP Unlocked 2021

App Name Hotstar Apk
Size 35MB / 14MB
Version v12.0.6
Android Support 4.0 or above
Last Updated 9 July 2021
Developer The Web Stream
Price FREE
Direct Download Link Hotstar Mod APK Download

How to install Hotstar Mod premium APK

  1. Uninstall the Play Store Version of the Hotstar App if you have already installed it on your phone.
  2. Open Settings of your Phone, Go to Security & Enable Unknown Sources.

  1. Download Hotstar Premium Apk from the above link & Install it. (Click on ‘Allow from this source’ if asked)
  2. Open the Hotstar App & Enjoy.
